languages.text: "Хм-м-м... Прискорбное известие. А главное — покидать Даргонус запрещено вот уже несколько циклов! Похоже, семейство Версериан вновь не справляется со своими прямыми обязанностями". {n}Губернатор бросает снисходительный взгляд на Абеляра.{/n}

"Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Хм-м-м... Прискорбное известие. А главное — покидать Даргонус запрещено вот уже несколько циклов! Похоже, семейство Версериан вновь не справляется со своими прямыми обязанностями". {n}Губернатор бросает снисходительный взгляд на Абеляра.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems that the Werserian family has once again failed at their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

"Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

"Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

"Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

languages.text: “嗯……这真是个令人遗憾的消息。更重要的是，我们早在好几个周期之前，就已经明令禁止任何舰船离开达戈努斯了。看来，韦尔森家族又一次未能履行他们的主要职责。”{n}他朝阿贝拉德投去了一个屈尊纡贵的眼神。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “嗯……这真是个令人遗憾的消息。更重要的是，我们早在好几个周期之前，就已经明令禁止任何舰船离开达戈努斯了。看来，韦尔森家族又一次未能履行他们的主要职责。”{n}他朝阿贝拉德投去了一个屈尊纡贵的眼神。{/n}

languages.text: «Mmm... Son noticias lamentables. Es más, ¡desde hace unos ciclos está prohibido marcharse de Dargonus! Parece que la familia Werserian ha vuelto a fallar en sus responsabilidades principales». {n}Lanza una mirada condescendiente a Abelard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mmm... Son noticias lamentables. Es más, ¡desde hace unos ciclos está prohibido marcharse de Dargonus! Parece que la familia Werserian ha vuelto a fallar en sus responsabilidades principales». {n}Lanza una mirada condescendiente a Abelard.{/n}

languages.text: 「ふむ…それは残念な知らせです。何より、ダルゴナスを去ることはここ何周期もの間、禁じられています！ウェルザリアン家はまたしても本来の務めを果たすことができなかったようですな」{n}彼はアベラルドに対して侮蔑のまなざしを向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ…それは残念な知らせです。何より、ダルゴナスを去ることはここ何周期もの間、禁じられています！ウェルザリアン家はまたしても本来の務めを果たすことができなかったようですな」{n}彼はアベラルドに対して侮蔑のまなざしを向けた。{/n}

languages.text: "Hmm ... Das ist eine höchst bedauerliche Nachricht. Zumal ... es ist seit mehreren Zyklen verboten, Dargonus zu verlassen! Anscheinend hat es die Familie Werserian wieder einmal nicht geschafft, ihren Hauptverpflichtungen nachzukommen." {n}Er wirft Abelard einen missbilligenden Blick zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hmm ... Das ist eine höchst bedauerliche Nachricht. Zumal ... es ist seit mehreren Zyklen verboten, Dargonus zu verlassen! Anscheinend hat es die Familie Werserian wieder einmal nicht geschafft, ihren Hauptverpflichtungen nachzukommen." {n}Er wirft Abelard einen missbilligenden Blick zu.{/n}

languages.text: « Hmm... Voilà qui est fort regrettable. Sans compter qu'il est formellement interdit de quitter Dargonus depuis maintenant plusieurs cycles ! Il semblerait que la famille Werserian ait de nouveau failli à son devoir, » {n}ajoute-t-il en adressant à Abélard un regard plein de condescendance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Voilà qui est fort regrettable. Sans compter qu'il est formellement interdit de quitter Dargonus depuis maintenant plusieurs cycles ! Il semblerait que la famille Werserian ait de nouveau failli à son devoir, » {n}ajoute-t-il en adressant à Abélard un regard plein de condescendance.{/n}

languages.text: "Hımm. Bu gerçekten de can sıkıcı bir haber. Dahası, Dargonus'tan ayrılmak birkaç döngüdür yasak! Görünüşe göre Werserian ailesi bir kez daha birincil sorumluluğunu yerine getirmekte başarısız olmuş." {n}Abelard'a hor gören bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hmm... This is a truly regrettable bit of news. What's more — leaving Dargonus has been forbidden for several cycles now! It seems the Werserian family has once again failed in their primary responsibilities." {n}He shoots Abelard a condescending look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hımm, bu gerçekten de can sıkıcı bir haber. Dahası, Dargonus'tan ayrılmak birkaç döngüdür yasak! Görünüşe göre Werserian ailesi bir kez daha birincil sorumluluğunu yerine getirmek konusunda başarısız olmuş." {n}Abelard'a hor gören bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
